title: In an examination, 70% students passed in English and 65% passed in maths. If 27% failed in both, then what is the number of students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since all the given quantities are in percentage therefore we cannot find the exact number of students in the class. However for the sake of answering it'll be always 100%(in terms of percentage). P.S-The question is wrongly framed.
suppose the answer is 100. The percentages stand good for 200 or 3000. the question is wrongly framed. i am not sure.
